Class TriangleMeshTerrain

java.lang.Object

      com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet.geom.TriangleMeshTerrain
All Implemented Interfaces:
TriangleMesh
Direct Known Subclasses:
TriangleMeshTerrainFlat, TriangleMeshTerrainPlanet
public class TriangleMeshTerrain
extends AbstractTriangleMesh
implements TriangleMesh

This class holds all the terrain-related methods.

Method Detail

doNoise

protected void doNoise(TerrainParameters parameters)
Apply the noise functions to the terrain

Parameters:
parameters - The terrain parameters including noise controls

doSeaLevel

protected void doSeaLevel(TerrainParameters parameters)
Apply the sea level processing to the terrain. This includes determining whether vertices are part of the sea or land.

Parameters:
parameters - TerrainParameters including those that control this operation

doPowerLaw

protected void doPowerLaw(TerrainParameters parameters)
Apply the terrain power law processing.

Parameters:
parameters - TerrainParameters including those that control this operation

prepareRiverNeighbours

protected java.util.List<java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer>> prepareRiverNeighbours(int prepSteps)
Prepare for river generation. Creates a list of neighbours for each vertices.

Parameters:
prepSteps - The number of preparation steps in total for progress reports
Returns:
A list of neighbours for each vertices

prepareSeaVertices

protected boolean[] prepareSeaVertices(int prepSteps)
Prepare for river generation. Generates a list of vertices that form part of the sea.

Parameters:
prepSteps - The number of preparation steps in total for progress reports
Returns:
An array of booleans indicating whether a vertices is a sea vertices

doRivers

protected void doRivers(TerrainParameters parameters)
Carry out river processing. A number of rivers will be generated in the terrain.

Parameters:
parameters - TerrainParameters including those that control this operation

doColoursDebug

protected void doColoursDebug(TerrainParameters parameters)
Set up a colour scheme for debug purposes rather than the normal shading. Not used in normal operation

Parameters:
parameters - The parameters to be used including colour choices
